recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS 3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America, using a stylesheet available at https://github.com/digitallibraryoftennessee/DLTN_XSLT. mods.abstract: Interview with Polk Agee, the oldest practicing architect in Tennessee. Mr. Algee discusses his many architecture ventures in the Memphis area and explains the various styles he's worked with. In this interview Algee also mentions the demographics of the neighborhoods he has designed houses for. The interview was conducted in 1979.ï¿½
